      • find

        public static org.springframework.data.jpa.domain.Specification<com.netflix.genie.common.model.Cluster> find(java.lang.String name,
                                                                                                             java.util.Set<com.netflix.genie.common.model.ClusterStatus> statuses,
                                                                                                             java.util.Set<java.lang.String> tags,
                                                                                                             java.lang.Long minUpdateTime,
                                                                                                             java.lang.Long maxUpdateTime)
        Generate a specification given the parameters.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the cluster to find
        statuses - The statuses of the clusters to find
        tags - The tags of the clusters to find
        minUpdateTime - The minimum updated time of the clusters to find
        maxUpdateTime - The maximum updated time of the clusters to find
        Returns:
        The specification

        Get all the clusters given the specified parameters.
        Parameters:
